title: @Meddler Can Taric get a mana return for Bravado against Champions?
body:
This seems to me like a great way to improve Taric's ability to lane without giving him damage. He needs some sort of reward for risking damage to Bravado his enemies. The cool down reduction is great, but even then, he has to spend more mana to benefit from it. His mana costs on Q punish you for leveling it and his W is very lackluster to level. 

He feels like he needs a tiny something to put him in a good spot.

Any considerations?

replies.body:
Not Meddler, sorry, but can speak to this a bit.

Taric actually had this mechanic internally at various points, but we stripped it out in a general trimming pass along the way (mechanics tend to build up in kits, even into release sometimes).

Taric's early laning is pretty rough, and if we ever get a chance to help him out in that regard, that would be pretty nice. Early Mana costs especially seem to be a good opportunity, since he feels really constrained in that regard. That said, I'm not sure he's weak right now to the point that merits a buff. His late game especially is really strong.

Repertoir, can we get a ON-HIT item without AS steroid? 

I know it seems out of topic, but as a ex-Taric TOP player, I think a heavy damage ON-HIT item without AS could bring him back to TOP without any changes with his kit. 

Plus we don't have an item like that and next season it's at our door, just want you to toss that idea to anyone involved in creating new items for the next season.
